name: web-pdm-doc
description: An ER graph tool made with G6, the ultimate goal is to make an online PowerDesigner

scripts.docs:build: dumi build  &&  npm run typedoc && rm -rf  docker/public && cp -rf ./docs-dist  docker/public && cp ./doc/erd.jpeg docker/public/static/
scripts.deploy: npm update web-pdm && npm i xtend && npm i wrappy &&  npm run deploy:now
scripts.deploy:now: npm run docs:build  && npm run publish-server && npm run build-remote
scripts.webpdm-deploy: cd packages/web-pdm-lib && npm run publish-npm && cd ../../ && npm run deploy

author: 北名
